# Sports Galleries

> **来源**: <https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/sports-galleries-in-fortnite-creative>
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-26T23:11:58.395896

---

**Sports** [galleries](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/fortnite-creative-glossary#gallery) share [themes](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/fortnite-creative-glossary#island-theme) of competitive activities and recreational structures.

In the **Galleries** [category](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/fortnite-creative-glossary#category), you can browse for building pieces to make your own unique structures. The Galleries tab also offers environmental and prop items as well.

This page is a visual guide to help you find galleries that fit a theme more quickly.

To learn more about how to place gallery pieces to create an island that’s uniquely your own, check out [Building Basics](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/building-basics-in-fortnite-creative).

## Chonker’s Speedway Category

|  |  |  |  |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| [Chonker’s Speedway Wall and Roof Gallery](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/d67030eb-9f01-4128-9e9d-ef5b5be6ce0d?resizing_type=fit) | [Chonker’s Speedway Floor and Stair Gallery](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/4d41daa8-a39c-4c21-b36a-b4cb8f01f870?resizing_type=fit) | [Chonker’s Speedway Prop Gallery](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/d49383f9-54c7-4fe0-9774-65ca54f9cf1c?resizing_type=fit) | [Chonker’s Speedway Nature Gallery](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/c6bf55ac-f59c-4ed7-a4a9-4b1d5ab3a14b?resizing_type=fit) |
| **Chonker’s Speedway Wall and Roof Gallery** | **Chonker’s Speedway Floor and Stair Gallery** | **Chonker’s Speedway Prop Gallery** | **Chonker’s Speedway Nature Gallery** |
